name: Notion Template Indexer
description: Tired of losing and confusing your templates?Use the Notion - Template Indexer by Shosan!Quickly identify your templates on the fly!Categorize them, obviously, otherwise? I mess!Make sure you keep track of how many templates are on any category automatically with formulas!And more...!Make sure to download before it's too late for your templates. Save them!!
features: Quickly identify your templates on the fly!; Categorize them, obviously, otherwise? I mess!; Make sure you keep track of how many templates are on any category automatically with formulas!
